reference:
P. K. Andersen, O. Borgan, R. D. Gill and N. Keiding (1993)
Statistical Models based on Counting Processes.
Springer.
description:
Description
The Melanoma data frame has data on 205 patients in Denmark
with malignant melanoma.
title: Survival from Malignant Melanoma

parameters.status:
1 died from melanoma, 2 alive, 3 dead from
other causes.
parameters.time: survival time in days, possibly censored.
